description: This tool computes an affine transform (rigid or affine) from labeled landmark images. It requires input images to be N-ary, in the same physical space as the images you want to register, and to have the same landmark points defined within them. Landmarks are defined from the center of mass of the labels in the input images. ITK-snap can be used to generate the label images.

fixed_image.title: Fixed image with labeled landmarks
fixed_image.description: The fixed image containing labeled landmarks (N-ary image).

moving_image.title: Moving image with labeled landmarks
moving_image.description: The moving image containing labeled landmarks (N-ary image).

transform_type.title: Transform type
transform_type.description: Type of transform to compute: 'rigid' or 'affine'.

output_affine.title: Output affine
output_affine.description: The output file for the affine transform matrix (e.g., OutAffine.txt).
